summary: Excellent supervisory and organizational skills with the ability to effectively handle multiple ongoing events and time critical projects. Flexible, fast-learner who adapts quickly to new situations and enjoys working in a team setting. Strong customer service abilities and accustomed to working with a broad spectrum of personalities.

experience.title: Construction Manager II
experience.description: Mobile L700 builds out for T-Mobile. Coordinated plans and specs using marketing programming standards. Educated general contractor personnel on quality standards. Reviewed and investigated PCORs. Submitted all project closeout documents per contract. Performed site pre-inspections and post-construction audits. Provided status information on project progress to management. Recorded and rejected incorrect material deliveries. Tools used: LDO cam, Site handler, Ericsson portal, Excel.

experience.title: Construction Manager
experience.description: AT&T RMR project, PMW Sprint / iDen project. Colorado, Wyoming, Montana assigned market of work. Managed start/finish, closeout packaging, BOM creation and review with GC, scoping, and redlining. Maintained milestone points in Excel, daily conference calls, and site visits. Educated general contractor personnel on quality standards. Reviewed and tracked all PCORs. Submitted all project closeout documents per milestone tracker. Performed pre-inspections and post-construction audits. LTE Sprint/UMTS upgrades.

experience.title: Wireless Construction Manager
experience.description: Sprint Project. Supervisor responsibilities included BOM material ordering, reviewing drawings, redlining, as-built, daily site visits. Ensured crews had CPR, Com Train, Safety signage, fire extinguisher, first aid kit, Rescue bag, JHA properly filled out. Provided status information on site progress with construction manager. Performed pre-inspections and post-construction audits. Managed 86 sites, overseeing 2 field supervisors, building BOM for site, CD correct and given to GC, Change order reviewed and properly managed. Tracked milestone performance and conducted site audits with A% E vendor. Tracked P.O requests for approval or denial.

experience.title: Fire Fighter
experience.description: Firefighter / EMT. Duties included fire suppression, station maintenance, ongoing training. Extra duties included wildland team, Rescue team, continuing certifications in high angle rescue, SWR, and Diver. Active member in the Hammond fire as well as the high country near Fort Collins.

experience.title: Owner - Property preservation
experience.description: Ran property preservation business. Processed work orders for financial institutions regarding foreclosures. Secured and maintained property assigned through financial institutions. Managed several general contractors, took bids, site surveys. Bookkeeping, spreadsheets, ordering supplies.

experience.title: Field Construction Foreman
experience.description: Operations with RF: Re Mods, Antenna swap outs, assembly/erection of tower structures, running coax lines, jumpers, TMA, diplexers, sweeping, closeout packages. Microwave full dress out using elliptical coax lines, path alignment, close out packages. Anritsu sweeping.

experience.title: Foreman
experience.description: Managed crews assembling, mounting, running of coax, swinging path for full microwave build outs. RF: Assembly of mounts, antennas, tower, monopole, guide towers, self supports, rooftops. Running coax of varied sizes, rigging, grounding, sweeping, turning in closeouts.

experience.title: Installation Technician
experience.description: Travel throughout Texas and Oklahoma to install twisted wire and fiber optic telephone and data cables in office buildings. Follow wiring diagrams and blueprints; ensure accuracy of cable and junction box layout. Test all units to ensure a passing grade. Installation of A/V system, light mods, stage set ups.

education.school: Heidelberg High School, U.S. Department of Defense
